info.title: Data Mining Algorithms I
info.description:
Algorithms and concepts for Data Mining in large databases.

  • Introduction
  • How to maintain data? - Data Warehousing
  • How to find frequent patterns? - Mining Association Rules
  • How to find groups in data? – Clustering
  • How to predict class labels? - Classification
  • How to predict continuous values? – Regression
  • How to access data fast? - Indexing Structures for Databases
  • What else is out there? - Advanced Data Mining Topics
